name: Staff
text: This long piece of wood can aid in walking and deliver a mighty blow.

traits.name: Monk
traits.text: Abilities with this trait are from the monk class. A weapon with this trait is primarily used by monks.

traits.name: Two-Hand
traits.text: This weapon can be wielded with two hands to change its weapon damage die to the indicated value. This change applies to all the weapon’s damage dice.

favored_weapon.text: *Andoletta*  ,  *Apsu*  ,  *Arundhat*  ,  *Barbatos*  ,  *Bergelmir*  ,  *Blooms Of The Spreading Weald*  ,  *Ceyannan*  ,  *Chamiaholom*  ,  *Charon*  ,  *Etaris*  ,  *Findeladlara*  ,  *Folgrit*  ,  *Isis*  ,  *Kofusachi*  ,  *Lorthact*  ,  *Nethys*  ,  *Nyarlathotep (The Crawling Chaos)*  ,  *Ptah*  ,  *Rowdrosh*  ,  *The Enlightened Scholar's Path*  ,  *The Lost Prince*  ,  *Vapula*  ,  *Wards of the Pharaoh*  ,  *Yelayne*

group.name: Club
group.text: You knock the target away from you up to 10 feet (you choose the distance). This is forced movement.
